channel.title: [*] Project Relentless 317 [*]
channel.description:
[quote="Newty"]If your asking to post a development team, then you have my permission as long as you don't post any advertisements, or break any other rules.[/quote]
[b]Project Relentless[/b] Description of the project ; We're working on a good economy based server, as far as i understand - I have full permission from Newty to recruit for our project. We are using deob/protocol 317 for the base, using devolution. The server will be fully debugged, then features will be added to it, we're looking to create one of the best,or best of 317's ever. With your help.. it may be possible!
[b]Project Relentless - Server Details[/b] Project Owner/Host = The BankHead Project Owner/Coder(s) Ikram & Umair + _____ <-- 1 more position available.
I currently have a VPS for the next 5 months and 25 days! VPS Specs; Dedicated 3mbs upload pipe, 2GB Ram + 300 disk, 2 IP Adresses, Windows 2003 (I didnt really want server 2008)..
We will also be purchasing a new domain within the next month!
[b]Project Relentless - Recruitment[/b] We will not just let anyone join the project,and if you are new,or have never released a source,its hard to say we dont want you - but we wanna see some work/feedback!
We want the best/most respected on our team, if you would like to apply, you may click my msn on my profile.
[code]This recruitment thread is not fully developed yet, please stay tuned.[/code]

I am not going to post a app because I can code 1000x better then all these Rs2 people in here no questions asked.

Not Flaming.

On Topic: Good Luck On This Project.
It’s Going To Be Good Because You Got Alot Of Good Coders Working On It.

If your asking to post a development team, then you have my permission as long as you don’t post any advertisements, or break any other rules.

Description of the project ; We’re working on a good economy based server, as far as i understand - I have full permission from Newty to recruit for our project. We are using deob/protocol 317 for the base, using devolution.
